title: Methodology Issues in a Tailored Light Treatment for Persons With Dementia - Aim 2
description_brief: Aim 2 will investigate the effect of 3 different light exposure lengths on sleep, mood and agitation in persons with Alzheimer's disease. Participants will be randomly assigned to one of three conditions of light exposure: 1) 2-h morning light exposure; 2) 4-h morning light exposure; and 3) all day light exposure.
